message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its value and benefits, I propose a price of $12000 for this product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for something within my budget. Would you consider reducing the price to $10000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to negotiate further. Considering the value and uniqueness of our product, I propose a price of $11000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. Would you consider $9500 for the product?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your patience and understanding. Considering the high quality and functionality of our product, I am willing to offer it to you for $10500.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still aiming for a price closer to my budget. Could we possibly agree on $10000 for the product?
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I am willing to offer our product to you for $10250, considering the value it brings and your expressed budget constraints.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. Could we possibly agree on $10000 for the product?
Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I am willing to offer our product to you for $10125, hoping that this final adjustment will be acceptable.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers and your willingness to negotiate. I am confident that we can reach a fair agreement. Could we possibly settle on $10000 for the product?
